Metadata.title: Well-V
Metadata.description: Find your calm with guided audio sessions.

FirstLaunch.title: Welcome to Well-V!
FirstLaunch.description_1: Before you begin your first session, please take a moment to read this important safety information.
FirstLaunch.description_2: Always ensure you are in a safe and comfortable environment. Stay hydrated and listen to your body. If you experience any pain or discomfort, stop the session immediately and consult a healthcare professional if necessary.

FavoritesPage.title: Your Favorites
FavoritesPage.description: All your cherished sessions in one place.
FavoritesPage.no_favorites_description: Add sessions to your favorites to see them here.

categories.workout_description: Energizing sessions to get your body moving.
categories.yoga_description: Find your flow and connect with your breath.
categories.meditation_description: Calm your mind and find inner peace.
